repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript is of Vaikhānasa Āgama, Marīcipaṭala and it contains the tenth chapter of the section vimanārcanakalpa. Before the front cover there is a note with the manuscript title and information -- Marīcipaṭala (Vaikhānasagrantha) By Marīci Gratha, 150 pages 9 lines.

msItem.title: Marīcipaṭala (Vaikhānasa)

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 18 pp: 278 PBS 44 from the Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msItem.incipit:
1v 1 marīcimahāmuniṃ svasiṣyānvitakuśāsanena samāsīnaṃ sarvajñavijitendriyaṃśuddhaṅnānālokanivāsino dharmasaṃndīgdhāsīktā rkṣa? yassamāgamyānamya
1v 2 bhagavatya?kena mārgeṇa kairmantraikandevamarccayantaḥ kān lokān gamiṣyanti ityucuḥ . mariciruvāca . suprasannaṃ paramātmānannārāyaṇasyātvābhivassa
msItem.explicit: 82v 4 mayumadhvabhadraṃ kuryāt mahārthamānante ?ye dvāyopacāryayośca ku?śālādin kuṇḍayedītyaha marīciḥ ..
msItem.finalRubric: 82v 4 iti vaikhānase marīcipro 82v 5 kte vimanārcanakalpe vitālādivimānavidhinnāma dhaśamaḥ paṭalaḥ ..

support.p: Thin palm leaf as cover guard.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio 2 blank folio and 82 written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil Letter numerals in the left margin of the verso.
supportDesc.condition: Very good state of preservation. Some folio have broken corners.

handNote.desc: readable but some shapes are illegible.

additions.desc: On 1v hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin.
On 1v marīci proktaṃ is written in the lower left margin.
Inter section titles are seen On 2v ācārryaṛṇaṃ and bhūparikṣā is written in the left margin. On 3v grāmadevatāsthānaṃ is written in the left margin On 4v vāstuvidhi is written in the left margin.

listBibl.bibl: Śrīmadvaikhānase śrīmaharṣimarīcipraṇītānandādi saṃhitāmahāśāstre Srīvimānārcanākalpaḥ niravadhika śrīharigurubhaktibhareṇa sākṣātkṛta śrīmadveṃkaṭācalādhīśena saha divyākṣakrīḍāeasa viśeṣāsvādanaikatānāntaḥkaraṇānāṃ virāgikulasārvabhaumānāṃ śrīsvāmihāthīrāmajī guruvaryāṇāṃ srīmaddivyasaṃhāsanam alaṅkurvāṇaiḥ Śrīśeṣācala śrīpādapura śrīśukapurādivilasaṣchrībhagavaddivyālaya śrī kāryanirvahaṇadhurīṇaiḥ virāgikulaśirobhūṣaṇaiḥ śrīprayāgadāsajī samabhikhyaiḥ śrīmahantavaryaiḥ vaikhānasa-vyākaraṇapaṇḍita, va raghunāthacakravarti bhaṭṭācāryeṇa ca saudhayotvā śrī śrīnivāsabhagavaddivya bhāṇḍāgāroddhṛta draviṇena chennapuryām (madarāsa)bhaktavarya śrī raṅganāthaśreṣṭhivaryāṇāṃ śrīveṅkaṭeśvara mudraṇālaye mudrāpitaḥ 1926

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
